log.last prompt:
<s>[INST]Consider the following sentence: I am using a computer for the creation of 3-D models.

Select the most suitable dictionary definition which identifies the meaning of "computer" among the following definitions:

1) a machine for performing calculations automatically.
2) an expert at calculation (or at operating calculating machines).
[/INST]1) a machine for performing calculations automatically.</s>[INST]Consider the following sentence: a great delay.

Select the most suitable dictionary definition which identifies the meaning of "great" among the following definitions:

1) relatively large in size or number or extent; larger than others of its kind.
2) of major significance or importance.
3) remarkable or out of the ordinary in degree or magnitude or effect.
4) very good.
5) uppercase.
6) in an advanced stage of pregnancy.
[/INST]1) relatively large in size or number or extent; larger than others of its kind.</s>[INST]Consider the following sentence: What did you eat for dinner last night?

Select the most suitable dictionary definition which identifies the meaning of "eat" among the following definitions:

1) take in solid food.
2) eat a meal; take a meal.
3) take in food; used of animals only.
4) worry or cause anxiety in a persistent way.
5) cause to deteriorate due to the action of water, air, or an acid.
[/INST]1) take in solid food.</s>[INST]Consider the following sentence: Cerenia does not represent a particular risk for people.

Select the most suitable dictionary definition which identifies the meaning of "people" among the following definitions:

1) (plural) any group of human beings (men or women or children) collectively
2) the body of citizens of a state or country
3) members of a family line
4) the common people generally[/INST]
